name: Pong! Love2d Edition
description:
Pong! This version of the classic retro game pong was made in the highly capable Lua Game Engine/Library called Love2D! This project was mainly created to showcase the most basic abilities of the game engine and to inspire others to create their amazing games in Love2D! The game is essentially just a reskinned version of the classic pong game! The game mode is endless so you can play forever! The game's controls are listed below.

Move PaddleLeft Arrow KeyRight Arrow KeyOrUpDownOrWS
Main Menu/Pause MenuEscape/Esc

Visit the Love2D website to start creating your own games in Love2D!
